title: Candy Crush Soda Saga makes its way on to Windows 10
text:
Candy Crush Soda Saga makes its way on to Windows 10 
Published By: Neowin.net - Today 
After almost a year since release on iOS and Android, Candy Crush Soda Saga is finally on the Windows Store, as a universal app, making the ... Read Full Story ... Related articles:
